title: Why Banks Like Fidelity and ADB Trust Sendexa for OTP Security
excerpt: Ghana’s financial institutions rely on Sendexa for OTPs. Here’s how we prevent fraud where others fail.

content.text: OTP fraud costs African businesses millions yearly. Sendexa’s solution combines:

items: Dynamic sender IDs (e.g., ‘FIDBANK’ instead of generic numbers)
Geolocation-based delivery blocks (combat SIM swap scams)
Real-time analytics to detect unusual spikes
